name: Geologic timescale
summary: The geologic time scale (GTS), a system of chronological dating that classifies geological strata (stratigraphy) in time.

name: Human evolution
summary: Human evolution is the evolutionary process within the history of primates that led to the emergence of Homo sapiens as a distinct species of the hominid family, which includes the great apes.

name: Deaths from natural disasters
summary: Natural disasters kill on average 60,000 people per year and are responsible for 0.1% of global deaths

name: History of Taiwan
summary: Taiwan is often in the news due to China's ongoing claim to sovereignty, strongly rejected by the majority of Taiwan's people. This dataset provides a brief summary into the geopolitical history of the island.

name: History of Ukraine
summary: A humble attempt to lay out the timeline leading to the current invasion of Ukraine by Russia

summary: Excess weekly deaths in England and Wales

name: COVID-only deaths based on FOI
summary: Theoretical deaths based on FOI derived as a percentage of total deaths.

summary: Comparison of government imposed restrictions with variations in COVID deaths
